sentences.sContent: South Carolina claimed the power to exempt its citizens from the obligation to obey federal law.
sentences.sCn: 南卡罗来纳州宣称有权使其公民免除遵守联邦法律的义务。

remMethod.val: ex(出) + empt(拿) → 拿出去 → 免除

trans.tranOther: to give someone permission not to do or pay something
not affected by something, or not having to do it or pay it
